data.text: @SenTedCruz Won't save lives as long as democrats allow illegal immigrants to get CDL licenses and kill our citizens on the road.

@SenTedCruz NO. Gov or big tech control over transportation only allows the wrong admin more control. They can turn off our cars or worse if they dont agree with an individual or state.  STOP any path that leads to elite control. Increase training and requirements for the privilege to drive

@SenTedCruz Agree to disagree sir. I feel it should be a service set aside for people who are unable to operate a vehicle (after a night of drinking etc), to call upon like a taxi. But that's it and heavily restricted even then. We don't let ai fire on live targets, why this.

@SenTedCruz So why don’t you act??? The people of Iran are dead, dying, or being tortured because you are not attacking—because we are waiting. We are continuing our struggle, but our main hope is your strike. We have grown old. Why are you tormenting people like this? Finish it, please.

@SenTedCruz Self driving cars use consistent rational logical methodology. I love to pull up beside them and admire their predictability.

I try to stay away from the nutcase human drivers out there that have more horsepower than sense.

@SenTedCruz Y’all need to read the Epstein files. Shows Trump, Bannon, Epstein committed treason against the USA. Also, child rape and trafficking. Punishment for treason? Death, imprisonment, disqualification from holding office. The PEOPLE demand justice for Americans and for victims.
